title: go/printer: format x&1<<8 as x&1 << 8?
body:
A recent bug on sqrt (#13013) is caused by missing parenthesis
in condition for for loop:
```
    for ix&1<<shift == 0 {}
```

I suspect it might be a common error.
What if we make gofmt formats that to
```
    for ix&1 << shift == 0 {}
```
instead?

/cc: @griesemer
